transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir, Komal baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Sir ye aapki service chal rahi hai KK Enterprises ki Jodhpur Rajasthan se aur kal aapka discussion hua tha aapke account manager se Sujit ji se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur is par aapne jo feedback diya hai not satisfied sir feedback diya hai. Kya issue face kar rahe hai sir aap service mein IndiaMART ki? Nine months aapko
Customer: Ye jo kaunse manager allot hote hai humko?
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Ye ye jo manager allot hote hai na aapke ji ji ji Sujit aapke manager hai. Sujit se mam ek bhi abhi tak ek bhi kuch bhi useful nahi hai. Main inko pichli baar jitne bhi aaye maine sabko bataya Sujit ji aaye abhi fir mera inke sath baat karne ka mam wo hua hi nahi. Mere ko baat hi nahi karni hai. Inhone bahut kuch
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Sorry main mana nahi karunga lekin maine baat hi nahi karni hai. Inhone se wo targeting kiya nahi inko bilkul. Ji. Theek hai mam. Ha because of ek hi issue hai jitne bhi aapke pehle ki ab aapki profile ab theek ho gayi hai ab aapke paas se aayega lekin kisi ko mere product hi samajh mein nahi aaya to main sell kya karu?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ab mere sath mam bylead ulti isliye aati hai wo matlab jo ki mere purpose ki nahi hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Sir bylead
Executive: Ji bataiye. Ji aap boliye.
Customer: Nahi aap ye aap bataiye aap bataiye aap bataiye.
Executive: Aap jaise mere ko bata rahe hai na ki bylead aapke use ki nahi aa rahi hai ya aapke paas irrelevant product ki aa rahi hai ya hum log aapka product line nahi samajh pa rahe hai. To sir aapke paas jaise account manager aapko call hi isliye karte hai taki agar hamare ko wo product line aapke samajh nahi aa rahi to at least aap agar wo mujhe bataoge to main aapke February ko February mein plan liya tha maine. Ji. Theek hai abhi pura year khatam ho raha hai abhi tak ye log meri profile hi theek kar rahe hai account manager hai na aap ye bhi to samajhne ki koshish kijiye jab pura ek saal ka mera one year ka subscription tha ab wo pura khatam ho raha hai abhi tak meri profile hi theek nahi ho pa rahi hai to mam mere ko kya hai na wo sirf money commitment hai nahi ki main deke bhul gaya to isliye ek saal theek hai maine use lena bhi band kar diya hai. Khatarnak renew karwane ka mera kuch bhi mood nahi hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Because jab aap log ye nahi samajh pa rahe hai ki meri profile mein main product sell kar raha hu bylead kis type ki chahiye to mam uske baad fir kya wo end hai na koi matlab to hai nahi aapne wo February mein March mein phone kiya mere season mein maine sabko time diya maine IndiaMART use kiya ek bylead matlab ki mere mein manufacturer hu main do paanch 10 20 mein kaam nahi karta hu ye cheez maine aapke inko manager ko jitne bhi aaye beech mein sabko samjha samjha ke pareshan ho gaya ab ye mere ko bol rahe hai do paanch jo bhi quantity aati hai inki bylead dijiye mam mere paas itna time thodi hai. Aap ye bhi to samajhne ki koshish karo aapka ek message hum kisi mein aaya matlab ye samajhne ki nahi hui product kya hai aadesh ki bhi aaya hai ab ye keh raha hai ki main theek karta hu are ab tak nahi ho raha hai pura saal hi ho gaya aur teen mahine mujhe theek hai khatam kar diya IndiaMART use hi nahi mam fir matlab suggest karunga jitne mein bhi diya hai ki kuch bhi matlab fayda nahi kyunki aap bhi nahi samajh pa rahe is baat ko useful hai lekin working mein pichle bhi hai jo bhi aap allot karte hai to wo bhi nahi samajh pa rahe insan bech kya raha hai matlab sirf sale kya ho raha hai uske end pe pratham kar kuch kaam kya hi karenge aap. Ji. Mere ko ye simple sa sawal hai mam ek saal complete hone wala hai aapka ek bhi banda ya jo bhi aaye hai wo yahi nahi samajh pae ki main kya bech raha hu. Ji. Hai na ye bhi hai na mam aur dusri cheez ek manufacturer mein aur ek wholesaler aur ek retailer mein inko farak samjhaiye ye manufacturer ko bol rahe hai ki aap retail retail ka kaam kare. Ji. Theek hai ab mere paas se to bylead suno mere ko third mahine ek do bando ke call aate hai wo bol rahe hai ki aap wo diwali ki school diwali ki manufacturing hai ha ji hai sir to aap ek kaam kijiye apna red stock bech dijiye humko paanch rupay meter ka wo jo bhi hai ek rupay meter mein mangte hai.
Hmm. To main ajeeb baat ho gayi to call attend karne se bhi pareshan ho gaya wo bhi hai ki bylead mein jinki call aate hai wo bilkul check kariye main to call bhi attend nahi karta. Ha main dekh raha hu. Alag alag alag alag ha mamu ne alag alag number se call karne shuru kar dijiye sir apna red stock de do brass ki murti de do. Mam ek manufacturer mein aur ek retailer mein farak hota hai ek murti pe main bana ke kya karunga main kyun bechunga mam. Ji. Theek hai dusra mera ye badges ka kaam ke hai badges mein inko sirf bahar nikalne ki kya hai dene ki kya hai inko ye samjhate samjhate pareshan ho gaya inki samajh mein hi nahi aaya ki main bech kya raha hu. Theek hai secondly mera school ki tie belt aur wo monogram school ki tie hoti hai inko samajh mein nahi aati ki aage ki DC mein bech kya raha hu. Hmm. Tie belt ka aaj mere paas ek bhi lead aisi nahi aayi hai jiski 200 300 bhi quantity ho. 50 piece 100 piece 10 10 piece mangte hai mam aur minimum quantity start 500 se hoti hai. Ji. Ab aap ek baat bataiye ek belt ki rate start ho rahi hai 12 rupees. Ji. Theek hai ye 12 rupees se sell karna start karta hu maximum 30 rupees tak ka material kharidte hai ab iske andar 100 piece bhi maine bech liye agar matlab agar aap 30 rupees mano 30 rupees mano to 3000 rupees mere paas mam ka 3000 rupees mein main kya kamaunga? Ji. Ab 3000 rupees mein designing cost ye cost wo chali jati hai aur uske baad se bhi ek dhang ka bylead nahi aake diya hai ek dhang ka. Sir aapke aapki side se ye zarur hota hai time to time call aayega ek hi cheez bolte hai is baar aap time nikalo aapki profile theek kar dete hai main iski do do ghante dekh ke kya profile theek karwaunga main. Sir main aapka jaise catalog check kar rahi hu na aap dekhenge already jo aapka current catalog quality score hamare jaise jo aapke catalog update kiya gaya hai na uska current score 72% already hai baki aap jaise mere ko bata rahe hai mera ye product hai aapki jaise main category bhi jaise check kar pa rahi hu school belt brass statues metal logo school tie yahi sari category jo aap mujhe bata rahe hai na category sir wahi updated hai theek hai abhi jaise ab aapka ek concern isme aur aa raha hai ki customer jo aapke paas aa rahe hai wo kam order quantity ke customer aapke paas aa rahe hai to sir aapki jo listing hai na abhi mainly ye listing aapki show kar rahi hai iska bhi reason bata deta hu main aapko ki hello main iska bhi reason bata deta hu aapke paas ye mere paas quantity kam quantity mein kyun aa rahe hai. Ji. Theek hai jab maine iska wo subscription liya tha to jo mere paas aaye the maine unko bola tha ki mujhe Jodhpur wale form se subscription lena hi nahi hai mera main manufacturing UP mein hai UP ki form se lena hai theek hai inhone apna keval product bechne ke liye ki sir hum aapka ye bhi add kar denge hotel ka bhi add kar denge ye ho jayega wo ho jayega sab kuch karke to le liya gaya uske baad mein mujhe is cheez ke regarding bilkul nahi tha ab ek aap ek hi cheez samjhiye mam aaj agar aap kuch lene ja rahe hai market mein theek hai aapko bulk quantity mein kharidna hai to aap jahan pe uski manufacturing ho rahi hai aap wahan se kharidenge ya fir jahan pe pura all over India mein trader baithe hai aap business se lenge agar aapko bulk quantity mein kharidna hai bulk quantity mein jaise mam wahi bas ja rahi hai ki maine inko jab se koshish kari ki mera yahan Jodhpur se to trader hi ho gaya mam meri manufacturing UP mein inke text style naam se registered hai. Mere paas iska all over kaam brass ka to pura finger pe hi ho raha hai UP mein aur tie belt ka Delhi mein ya fir UP mein Aligarh mein ho raha hai mere ko Aligarh se registered karwana hai. Ji. Ek ye bhi nahi samjh raha hu. Vaisa 10 baar bola aap isko branch office karke dal do Aligarh ko wo bhi nahi dala gaya aapko. Ah isme main aapko batati hu sir jo aapka hamare paas jo GST number hai na us par jo aapka registered address hai na wo Jodhpur Rajasthan ka hai to isme jo aapko hai mam. Ha. Ji. Bilkul hai because Rajasthan mein mera residence hai maine inko yahin pe bola tha mujhe to Aligarh ke usse wo GST se hi wo karwana hai ki sir hum aapka wo bhi add kar denge to aap do state mein kaam aa jayega dusra wala aaj tak wo nahi hua usse aur mere ko mujhe jahan tak lagta hai ye ban gayi hai. Sir ah ab same agar pin code rehta hai na jaise location let suppose aapke Rajasthan ke Rajasthan ka agar aap pin alternate address add karte ho to wo to yahan pe show ho jayega but agar aapka UP ka address hai to wo yahan par alternate address mein aapka add bhi nahi ho payega wo to. Wo to GST alag alag ha. Ha main yahi aapko kehna chah raha hu mujhe Jodhpur se lene ka matlab ki ye sabse pehle hi aake kaam aane ka ek source band hua. Theek hai nahi sir aisa nahi hai main sir isme dekhiye aapko interrupt kar rahi hu aisa nahi hai sir agar aapne Rajasthan se liya hai. Nahi main aapko ek cheez samjhata hu dekho Rajasthan mein bhi fir aap all over India mein kahin kabhi ek school uniform ki shop samajhte hai aap? Theek hai ji unka jinka bhi school ki tie belt ka minimum kaam matlab ye jab season chalta hai 10 lakh rupees minimum kaam hota hai ek shop ka. Ji. Theek hai to 10 lakh rupees ke liye direct ye dalta hai ki tie belt manufacturer in Delhi ya fir in Delhi. Hmm hmm. To fir mera naam aana hi possible nahi hai na aap ye bhi to samjhne ki koshish kariye. Main sir wo cheez bhi samajh rahi hu but jo aap jaise aap mainly manufacturer ho theek hai na aur abhi jaise aapki jo listing hai na abhi jo current plan aapka chal raha hai wo Jodhpur se chal raha hai aur wo aapka basic plan hai basic plan mein main aapko ye ye nahi bol sakti hu ki sir aapke paas sari jo bhi IndiaMART se lead aayengi sari bulk quantity ki leads aayengi aur abhi jo mainly aapki dependence hai. Sir sir ek cheez bataiye aapka customer hota hai usko plan batane ka hota hai mujhe ek hi plan bataya gaya tha aap premium plan batate. Ji. Premium plan mujhe aaj tak kisi ne bhi discuss nahi kiya ki aapke paas aur quantity to aapke premium plan nahi aata matlab ek plan tha na mujhe agar ye normal hota ki basic plan hai aur basic plan mein kuch use hi nahi hai to main to abhi aap simple sa thought hai to apna ek saal kyun paise kharab karega jo cheez uske matlab ki nahi hai. Ji. Theek hai ab iske liye lagi main to wahan pe keh raha hu ek lakh rupees bhi lagte lekin mera kuch nahi. Ji. Sir definitely aap wahan pe investment kar sakte the main wahi bol rahi hu definitely aap wahan pe investment kar sakte the par aap dekhiye aap jaise India first time user ho theek hai na aur abhi jo aap start hui hai na current listing mein aisa nahi hai ki sir aapko order nahi aayenge IndiaMART se ya aapko business nahi milega but isme jo business ki capacity aapki rahegi wo basic plan ke according hi rahegi aur aap jaise abhi jo IndiaMART se aapki main dependency hai wo by leads par hai but agar aap dekhenge by leads par sir aap utna nahi focus kar rahe ho kyunki kahin na kahin jo hamari side se aapko guide kiya gaya ya jo aapko inform kiya gaya wo aapke according wo theek nahi hai to main dekhiye sir isme agar aap dekhenge na Jodhpur se bhi kafi sari companies hai listed hai aur yahan par humne aapki product aisa nahi hai update nahi kiya hai aapka catalog humne design nahi kiya hai sari cheeze yahan se kar rakhi hai main ek baar suggest karungi ek baar agar aap jo humne yahan par update kiya hai na aapko agar ek baar video meeting par aakar wo sari cheeze ek baar agar aap cross check kar le wo zyada better rahega ki hum logo ne aapka catalog wo properly update kiya hai ya nahi kiya aur usme agar aapko lag raha hai ki ye ye correction ki requirement hai aap wahin par mujhe guide kar do aapka account manager Sujit rahega wo wahin pe sare correction sir aapke according wahan par wo update kar dega but fir aap aapka second aata hai ki aap service par aapko active bhi rehna padega main manti hu sir aap manufacturer ho aap utna time shayad nahi de payenge but agar aapke office mein koi staff ho. Staff ka koi issue nahi hai mam staff ko main khud dene ko tayar hota hu koi issue nahi hai lekin ek cheez ka aapko mera ek simple sa thought hai. Baat ye hai agar jahan se kuch milne ka ho to wahan pe time aap ek baar check kariye isme time maine diya hai. Ji. Ab mujhe wahan se main wo main ye nahi keh raha ki maine do teen mahine diye chalo maine ek mahina 15 din diye lekin jab mujhe samajh mein aa gaya ki kisi matlab ka nahi hai mera keval time waste ho raha hai to us din se mam maine time dena band kar diya. Ji sir main aapka wahi dekh pa rahi hu aap ek baar iske andar ye to dekho sara data hota hai na aap logo ke paas mere paas sara cheez. Theek hai iske andar na wo check kijiye jis time pe season chal raha tha season chalta hai se leke agar maine use liya hai season mein time nikal ke liya hai mam abhi tak hum log baithe hai ek rupees ka kaam nahi hai off season hai main abhi bhi use nahi lene chahta isko isko use isse acha hai main mere kisi aur cheez mein dimag chalaunga udhar se mere ko kam se kam output aane ke chance hai idhar to output aane hi nahi na. Baat ye hai. Sir main us cheez ko samajh rahi hu but jaise agar aap na jis tarah se main aapko guide kar rahi hu na aap agar Hello. Hello. Mam aapki aapki voice clear nahi aa rahi hai. IndiaMART mein kuch further investment kar de.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART service.

- Account managers are not helpful.

- Byleads are irrelevant and not useful.

- Profile not fixed, leading to no business.

- Wants UP form registration, not Jodhpur.

- Current plan is basic, not premium.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the catalog and quality score.

- Executive explained the current basic plan limitations.

- Executive suggested a video meeting for cross-checking.

- Executive offered account manager support for corrections.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join a video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, profile, catalog, account manager
